user_query: or I have enough knowledge to where I know what to do in any given situation and going off to a foreign land with a bunch of foreign people and foreign customs and foreign law enforcement and having language barriers not knowing exactly where you are without directions and maps and help that is a situation that while it should be very fun to go off and be adventurous and to kind of experience new things and broaden your horizons the paranoia side of those things have always been a little bit more prevalent in that idea for me hence why I have yet to venture outside of the United States and this movie completely preys upon that and having these guys go off to these foreign countries and basically get turned into cattle for all of these rich people to take out all their sick desires and Pleasures on and there's few things that I could think of to embody my fear more than that scenario horror films throughout history have completely fucked up situations that should be awesome for all of us you watch Texas Chainsaw Massacre it's like well I don't know if I want to go to Texas and I sure as shit don't want to travel down any back roads and if I'm ever needing any help I am not knocking on that door of that house you got franchises like Final Destination that make you have even more of a fear of flying and every single time I see one of those log trucks I get way the fuck out of the way and pass them shits immediately and then you get Hostel that now says you're stuck in the US

entities.entity_description: Hostel은 외국에서 여행자들이 부유한 사람들의 잔인한 욕망의 대상이 되는 공포 영화로, 해외 여행에 대한 공포를 자극하는 작품이다
Texas Chainsaw Massacre는 텍사스의 외진 시골길과 낯선 집에 대한 공포를 다룬 공포 영화이다
Final Destination은 비행기 사고 등 일상적인 상황에서의 죽음에 대한 공포를 다룬 공포 영화 프랜차이즈이다

relationships.relationship_description: 두 영화 모두 일상적인 상황을 공포스럽게 만드는 호러 영화로 언급되었다
두 영화 모두 일상적인 상황을 공포스럽게 만드는 호러 영화로 언급되었다
두 영화 모두 일상적인 상황에 대한 공포를 유발하는 호러 영화로 함께 언급되었다
